person.content:
Please identify the "Person" entities in the following paragraph.

Paragraph: Justin made his second straight start for Harbaugh , who has a knee injury .

Let's think step by step.

1. Justin
2. Harbaugh.

In this paragraph, "Justin" is the person who made the second start, and "Harbaugh" is the person who has a knee injury and is the coach of Justin.
Please remove irrelevant entities and only keep the entities that clearly refer to Person.

1. Justin
2. Harbaugh.

These are the only entities in the paragraph that clearly refer to persons.

Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Person".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

organization.content:
Please identify the "Organization" entities in the following paragraph.

Paragraph: Justin made his second straight start for Harbaugh , who has a knee injury .

Let's think step by step.

1. Harbaugh

This is an organization in the form of a person's last name, but it is commonly known as the name of a football coach. In this context, it refers to John Harbaugh, who is the head coach of the Baltimore Ravens in the National Football League.
Please remove irrelevant entities and only keep the entities that clearly refer to Organization.

1. Baltimore Ravens (John Harbaugh is the head coach of this NFL team)

So, the only relevant organization entity in the paragraph is the Baltimore Ravens.

Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Organization".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.
